entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind northeast 30 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow this evening. Blowing snow at times before morning. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Monday 10 April 2023
